step.title: Adding the electronics and management system to the module

paragraph.htmltext:
Electronics and management system are added to the module to be able to monitor the module when it is used in an application.

During this step measures need to be taken to avoid electrical short circuit, leakage and thermal runaway. These measures are:

  • Covering current connector
  • Avoid blunt tooling
  • Avoid electrical and mechanical abuse

To decrease the effects of the risks, the operator shall wear safety gloves and glasses which protect against heat, sparks and electrolyte. Monitoring the temperature can help to detect a thermal runaway in a early stage.
